resources.string: The Bride of Christ Fellowship is a non-profit organization that allocates all donations to the community and those in need. \n\nWe strive to help our community in anyway we can. Please consider donating some extra supplies or signing up to volunteer!
\u00a9 2022 The Bride of Christ Fellowship, Inc.\n-- -- All Rights Reserved -- --

You can read about Our Work and get involved in our cause. You will discover that you will be part of something bigger than yourself. \n\nJoin us in this journey where we make an impact in people\'s lives. We have already helped thousands in different communities. Your support and help is and will always be welcome. Any contribution matters - small or big. Start today and be blessed.

The Bride of Christ Fellowship is a small town church that serves their community in a number of ways. Their primary concern is to provide support for families and people in need by hosting food drives, clothing drives, and giving away essential items. 

The church consists of less than 50 members, so new volunteers are always more than welcomed. They have helped out countless families and individuals in the community and plan to continue at a larger scale.
We have collaborated with the Bride of Christ Fellowship and formed a non-profit in an effort to facilitate the work they do for their community. The church's dedication and the morals they stand for make it obvious why we wanted to work with them. 

Our goal is to help the church add some structure to their processes and give them solutions to any problems they may face. 

By working with the church, we have been able to provide them with risk analysis, a structured way of receiving and storing donations, quality control methods to make sure donations are safe, and an organization that the community can rely on.


The Team: 

 \- Lucas Fletcher 
 \- Massinissa Oukali 
 \- Pemphyle Nzuzi 

Because of our collaboration, we are able to provide the church with tools that make the jobs they do that much easier. 

One of the church's main activities is donating supplies to the community; anything from food, water, toys, or any essential items. 

Providing them with a website allows them to keep track of the donations they are receiving and accept more people to volunteer.
Thank you very much for your donation.

Giving to those in need is one of the church\'s top priorities with the community. It\'s our pleasure to help out in ways such as giving out food to the homeless or families in need. \n\nYou can help out and get involved by filling out the form on the volunteer page!

Since clothing is the most common donation we get, we make sure that everyone who needs clothing can get it, with no limit on how much you can take! \n\nThis is one of the main ways we are able to help out our community.

It\'s important that the kids are also involved with receiving donations and is especially important to us around the holiday season. All toys are inspected for choking hazards and defects before given away. \n\nConsider donating if you have any spare toys! Your donation will go a long way.

Technology is now a part of almost everybody\'s lives, and is almost necessary to function in today\'s society. \n\nWe make sure that donated electronic devices are wiped of any existing data, contains no malware, and is given to those who need it.
